verses.text: Happy \w those|strong="H5375"\w* whose \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w* \w is|strong="H6588"\w* \w pardoned|strong="H5375"\w*, whose \w sin|strong="H2401"\w* \w is|strong="H6588"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w*.

Happy \w are|strong="H3068"\w* those, free \w from|strong="H3068"\w* falseness \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* whom \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* reckons \w no|strong="H3808"\w* debt \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w guilt|strong="H5771"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* held \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w peace|strong="H2790"\w*, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* wore \w away|strong="H3605"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* endless \w groaning|strong="H7581"\w*;

\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3119"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w did|strong="H3915"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* lie \w heavy|strong="H3513"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*. \w The|strong="H5921"\w* sap \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* life \w was|strong="H3027"\w* dried \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w fierce|strong="H3513"\w* summer-heat. \qs \+w Selah|strong="H5542"\+w*\qs*

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* began \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w acknowledge|strong="H3045"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, \w not|strong="H3808"\w* concealing \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w guilt|strong="H5771"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* moment \w I|strong="H5921"\w* vowed \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w confess|strong="H3034"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w*, \w then|strong="H5375"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w yourself|strong="H5921"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w pardon|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w guilt|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*. \qs \+w Selah|strong="H5542"\+w*\qs*

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* cause \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H4325"\w* faithful \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* distress; \w then|strong="H3808"\w*, \w when|strong="H6256"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* rush, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w reach|strong="H5060"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w For|strong="H6862"\w* you are \w my|strong="H5341"\w* \w shelter|strong="H5643"\w*, you \w protect|strong="H5341"\w* \w me|strong="H5437"\w* \w from|strong="H5437"\w* \w trouble|strong="H6862"\w*, \w and|strong="H5437"\w* \w surround|strong="H5437"\w* \w me|strong="H5437"\w* with \w deliverance|strong="H6405"\w*. \qs \+w Selah|strong="H5542"\+w*\qs*

“\w With|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* steadfastly \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w instruct|strong="H3384"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* should \w go|strong="H3212"\w*.

Do \w not|strong="H1077"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* \w or|strong="H5483"\w* \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w mule|strong="H6505"\w*, \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H1077"\w* understanding, \w but|strong="H1961"\w* need \w bridle|strong="H7448"\w* \w and|strong="H5483"\w* halter \w to|strong="H1961"\w* curb \w them|strong="H7126"\w*, else \w they|strong="H1077"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H1077"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H7126"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* godless \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w sorrows|strong="H4341"\w*, \w but|strong="H7563"\w* \w those|strong="H5437"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* trust \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w compassed|strong="H5437"\w* \w about|strong="H5437"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H3068"\w* \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*, \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* ring \w out|strong="H7442"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w joy|strong="H7442"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.
